TopicTitle: Does anyone understand what's going on with this weird IVA glitch?

Articles.Content:
I have several IVA mods installed, but the issue was going on before I installed them I believe. The mods are RPM, ASET, and DE_IVA I believe. 

Essentially, parts external to the IVA view as well as the surface and buildings are visible before the actual IVA view is. Its really trippy. 

Here's an Imgur album of what I am talking about: https://imgur.com/a/rDMI5u8

This bug makes IVA use pretty much impossible. Any suggestions on how to fix it? I'll be happy to provide more details.
Looks to me like one of your mods is causing both the IVA and the external view camera to be active at the same time.
